articles.content: 1.原文連結： https://goo.gl/c8q5MC 2.原文內容： Stock and bond markets are doing a strange thing that is reminiscent of the 1987 crash 股債市異常行為勾起1987大崩盤回憶 David Rosenberg says a rise in the 10year Treasury yield during a stock market drop seldom occurs. Rosenberg: 10年公債驟升 I cannot tell you how rare a market condition this is that yields are rising into this risk pullback he wrote in a note to clients Friday.
